articles.title: American influencer apologizes for snatching Australian baby wombat - CBS News
articles.description: American influencer Sam Jones said that she had picked up a wombat to try to take the animal off the road.
articles.content: An American influencer who sparked outrage after posting a video of her snatching a baby wombat from its mother while in Australia apologized on Saturday, saying she had acted out of concern for the … [+2645 chars]

articles.title: Hamas says it will release Edan Alexander, the last living American hostage - The Washington Post
articles.description: The offer to release the American hostage appears to be an effort to pressure Israel into starting discussions over a second phase to the ceasefire in Gaza.
